body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ORDER xmlns="http://www.opentrans.org/XMLSchema/1.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.opentrans.org/XMLSchema/1.0   openTRANS_ORDER_1_0.xsd" version="1.0" type="standard">
    <ORDER_HEADER>
        <ORDER_INFO>
            <ORDER_ID>oneShop 123456</ORDER_ID>
            <PARTIES>
                <PARTY>
                    <PARTY_ID type="supplier_specific">10000</PARTY_ID>
                    <PARTY_ROLE>buyer</PARTY_ROLE>
                    <ADDRESS>
                        <NAME>Xentral ERP Software GmbH</NAME>
                        <STREET>Fuggerstrasse 11</STREET>
                        <ZIP>86150</ZIP>
                        <CITY>Augsburg</CITY>
                        <COUNTRY_CODED>DE</COUNTRY_CODED>
                    </ADDRESS>
                </PARTY>
                <PARTY>
                    <PARTY_ID type="supplier_specific">10000</PARTY_ID>
                    <PARTY_ROLE>delivery</PARTY_ROLE>
                    <ADDRESS>
                        <NAME>Xentral ERP Software GmbH</NAME>
                        <STREET>Fuggerstrasse 11</STREET>
                        <ZIP>86150</ZIP>
                        <CITY>Augsburg</CITY>
                        <COUNTRY_CODED>DE</COUNTRY_CODED>
                    </ADDRESS>
                </PARTY>
                <PARTY>
                    <PARTY_ID type="supplier_specific">10000</PARTY_ID>
                    <PARTY_ROLE>invoice_recipient</PARTY_ROLE>
                    <ADDRESS>
                        <NAME>Xentral ERP Software GmbH</NAME>
                        <STREET>Fuggerstrasse 11</STREET>
                        <ZIP>86150</ZIP>
                        <CITY>Augsburg</CITY>
                        <COUNTRY_CODED>DE</COUNTRY_CODED>
                    </ADDRESS>
                </PARTY>
                <PARTY>
                    <PARTY_ID>000001</PARTY_ID>
                    <PARTY_ROLE>supplier_specific</PARTY_ROLE>
                </PARTY>
            </PARTIES>
        </ORDER_INFO>
    </ORDER_HEADER>
    <ORDER_ITEM_LIST>
        <ORDER_ITEM>
            <LINE_ITEM_ID>1</LINE_ITEM_ID>
            <PRODUCT_ID>
                <SUPPLIER_AID>7000001</SUPPLIER_AID>
                <DESCRIPTION_SHORT>Artikel 1</DESCRIPTION_SHORT>
            </PRODUCT_ID>
            <QUANTITY>1</QUANTITY>
            <PRODUCT_PRICE_FIX>49.99</PRODUCT_PRICE_FIX>
            <PRICE_LINE_AMOUNT>49.99</PRICE_LINE_AMOUNT>
            <TAX>0</TAX>
            <TAX_AMOUNT>0</TAX_AMOUNT>
        </ORDER_ITEM>
        <ORDER_ITEM>
            <LINE_ITEM_ID>2</LINE_ITEM_ID>
            <PRODUCT_ID>
                <SUPPLIER_AID>7000002</SUPPLIER_AID>
                <DESCRIPTION_SHORT>Artikel 2</DESCRIPTION_SHORT>
            </PRODUCT_ID>
            <QUANTITY>2</QUANTITY>
            <PRODUCT_PRICE_FIX>99.99</PRODUCT_PRICE_FIX>
            <PRICE_LINE_AMOUNT>199.98</PRICE_LINE_AMOUNT>
            <TAX>0</TAX>
            <TAX_AMOUNT>0</TAX_AMOUNT>
        </ORDER_ITEM>
        <ORDER_ITEM>
            <LINE_ITEM_ID>3</LINE_ITEM_ID>
            <PRODUCT_ID>
                <SUPPLIER_AID>7000003</SUPPLIER_AID>
                <DESCRIPTION_SHORT>Artikel 3</DESCRIPTION_SHORT>
            </PRODUCT_ID>
            <QUANTITY>3</QUANTITY>
            <PRODUCT_PRICE_FIX>299.99</PRODUCT_PRICE_FIX>
            <PRICE_LINE_AMOUNT>899.97</PRICE_LINE_AMOUNT>
            <TAX>0</TAX>
            <TAX_AMOUNT>0</TAX_AMOUNT>
        </ORDER_ITEM>
    </ORDER_ITEM_LIST>
    <ORDER_SUMMARY>
        <TOTAL_ITEM_NUM>3</TOTAL_ITEM_NUM>
        <TOTAL_AMOUNT>1,149.94</TOTAL_AMOUNT>
    </ORDER_SUMMARY>
</ORDER>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ORDERRESPONSE xmlns="http://www.opentrans.org/XMLSchema/1.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.opentrans.org/XMLSchema/1.0   openTRANS_ORDERRESPONSE_1_0.xsd" version="1.0">

<xml>
    <nummer>99999</nummer>
    <name_de>API-Edited Product</name_de>
    <aktiv>1</aktiv>
    <anabregs_text>Text für Angebot, Auftrag, Rechnung usw.</anabregs_text>
    <abckategorie>B</abckategorie>
    <hersteller>Herstellername</hersteller>
    <herstellernummer>123</herstellernummer>
    <ean>234</ean>
    <zolltarifnummer>345</zolltarifnummer>
    <mindestlager>10</mindestlager>
    <mindestbestellung>5</mindestbestellung>
    <gewicht>1.5</gewicht>
    <lagerartikel>1</lagerartikel>
    <einkaufspreise>
        <staffelpreis>
            <lieferantennummer>70000</lieferantennummer>
            <ab_menge>1</ab_menge>
            <bestellnummer>123456789</bestellnummer>
            <bezeichnunglieferant>Artikel 123456789</bezeichnunglieferant>
            <preis>1.20</preis>
            <waehrung/>
        </staffelpreis>
    </einkaufspreise>
    <verkaufspreise>
        <staffelpreis>
            <ab_menge>1</ab_menge>
            <preis>2.20</preis>
            <waehrung>EUR</waehrung>
        </staffelpreis>
    </verkaufspreise>
</xml>
